summary: Implements a post‑processor that extracts embedded images from knowledge posts, copies them into a specified local directory, and rewrites the image references to URLs served by a local HTTP server, thereby externalizing image assets and reducing the repository size.
business_intent: To keep the knowledge repository lightweight and more portable by moving image files out of the main content store, enabling faster cloning, easier backup, and serving images via a local server for development or offline consumption.
